summary: Romeo & not so Juliet ( Reader x Peter Parker)
title: Romeo & not so Juliet ( Reader x Peter Parker)
body:
Requested by: Anon, Forever tag: @httpschanwoo, @spxce-frxckles, @miss-fangirl72, @alex–awesome–22, @fandomnerdsarecool, @slybitter11, @thedeadlymaria

You were just done with a class as you were walking over to the cafeteria with your backpack dragging over the floor. You were still exhausted from gym class as you had to run around the football field. You could care less how people stared at you for dragging your backpack over the floor, but you were to exhausted to lift it up. The cafeteria was crowed as you let your eyes go over every table. You were sighing deep as you didn’t want to sit with strangers or alone at some distant area as suddenly you saw a familiar person lift it’s head up from the crowd.

You frowned slightly when Peter Parker was holding his hand in the air to get your attention. Ned who sat next to Peter kept nudging him to pull his arm down as Peter seemed to be arguing with him while keeping his hand up. Seeing no other free table, you picked up your backpack and placed it over your shoulder on your way to Peter’s table. When you were near him he quickly pulled his tray closer to him and moved Ned’s backpack aside that laid on the table. You seated yourself in front of Peter as Ned looked terrified at him. When you weren’t looking was Peter kicking Ned subtly to not look so scared like that.

The boys weren’t used to have girls around them. Most of the time they spent together talking about science and build Lego structures. – “So… Y/n…” – Peter started but swallowed deep as you were looking at him. You slightly raised your eyebrow, waiting for something more of a possible question as Peter chuckled nervously, while tugging at his sleeve. – “Well I’m going to get something to eat while you might find your voice back?” – You got up as Peter stuttered a bit and nodded quickly. As soon as you left slapped Ned hard against Peter’s arm. – “Au! What was that for?” – Peter whined as he rubbed the pain area.

“Perhaps for asking a girl over to our table! I don’t know how to act around girls?” – Ned called out to Peter, trying not to raise his voice as Peter sighed deep, moving his head towards Ned. – “Just be yourself!” – Ned gave Peter a questionable look. – “Peter, no girl wants to know the real us!” – Peter wanted to explain to Ned that some girls would appreciate it as he noticed you arriving again. – “So, did you find your voice back?” – You joked as you seated yourself down and grabbed your fork with some food on it. – “Of course, Y/n!” – Peter replied in a steadier tone than before as you paused your fork for a moment as Peter thought you were going to joke at him as you just smiled at him. When he exhaled subtle, Peter felt more at ease around you as you were enjoying your lunch.

When it was time to head to class you said goodbye to them as you rushed away. Peter and Ned followed you to class on a slower pace as they were talking exuberant about science since they were too scared to talk about in front of you. They arrived in class a few moments before you as they seated themselves somewhere behind you. You were sitting on the second row, with the blackboard as front view as you were unpacking your backpack. Peter and Ned were whispering a bit as Peter pulled out his laptop from his backpack. The teacher entered moments later as you couldn’t wait what kind of book you would need to read this time. You really adored English as it widened your vision on books, you learned a lot of new books that you never knew you would love.

“Good afternoon class!” – the teacher spoke as she placed her briefcase on her desk. Everyone stopped talking as they watched the teacher pull out several things out of her briefcase. She was trying to hide her wide smile as she pulled out a small book and placed it behind her back. – “Class, I have brought you a classic that I believe everyone will adore!” – She said as she stood in the centre in front of the blackboard. Slowly revealing the book from behind her she could see all off the students leaning forward. – “Romeo and Juliet!” – she called out, trying to hide a squeal as some students loved the idea.

“No!” – you called out frustrated as you groaned annoyed with your elbows resting on your desk as you let your head fall on the desk together with your arms. Some students started laugh soft at your behaviour as the teacher looked at you with big confused eyes. – “I’d thought you’d like that, Y/n?” – she asked you as you banged your head softly against your desk. More students started to laugh as they loved your little act of drama. – “It’s not that bad…” – the teacher said to ease your thoughts as you lifted your head. – “It’s boring!” – you whined out as the teacher gave you a questioning look. – “Romeo and Juliet are the most popular story about love, tragedy and longing for someone that you would risk anything…”

You rolled with your eyes as you crossed your arms and leaned back in your chair. – “It’s a story about two fools where one fool fakes her death because her family doesn’t want her to be with him!” – you replied as you had no interest into reading that boring story. – “and I don’t blame her as she was only 14 years old and clearly drunk on love that she didn’t understand!” – The teacher crossed her arms slowly as she looked with a stern eye at you. – “Y/n, there is nothing wrong with having an opinion, but can you please stay respectful!” – You nodded soft with a sigh as the teacher was pleased with it for a moment.

The teacher than continued to explain to everyone why Romeo and Juliette were so important to read. – “William Shakespeare was the greatest writer from that time as he gave theatre a whole new meaning.” – You rolled with your eyes as you disagreed with her. – “Shakespeare was a drama queen!” – you joked as Peter snorted loud from your comment, other students laughed loud as they were out of control. – “Alright calm down!” – the teacher called out as she tried to calm down the laughing students. – “If you are such a hater against his work Y/n, you don’t mind if I use you for a little reading?” – You sighed loud as the teacher signalled for you to get up from your chair.

You got up and made your way over to the front as the teacher handed you a copy of the script. You took it with a fake smile as she smiled full of mischief back at you. – “Y/n you will play the role of Juliet!” – the teacher called out as you looked with a disgusted look at the funny lines in the script. – “Now I just need a Romeo…” – she said as she started to tap her finger against her chin, letting her eyes go over the boys in class. Peter was grinning at the teacher as a smirk curled up with her. – “Peter! You will be playing Romeo!” – She pointed at Peter as he lowered the screen of his laptop. – “Yeah -yeah- sure…” – he stuttered as he jumped up and walked over to the front.

“Hey…” – he said nervous as he stood next to you, you gave him a smile back as the teacher handed him a script of his own. The teacher than seated herself down at her desk as she told you to start. You sighed loud as you opened the script and read the gibberish words. – “Anytime now Y/n” – the teacher called out as some students laughed soft, you looked brief over your shoulder as you gave her a death stare. With a sigh you started to read out the gibberish talk. – “Oh Romeo, Romeo! Wherefore art thou Romeo? Deny thy father and thy name…” – you said on a slow and annoyed tone as you rather not engaged in this stupid act. – “Try to put more emotion into it, Y/n!” – the teacher called out as you sighed even louder and slapped your hand against the script. – “Those lines are ridiculous! I mean who even speaks like that!”

“People in that time area did, Y/n now continue please!” – The teacher replied as she pointed at Peter to take the next few lines. – “By a name, I know not how to tell thee who I am” – Peter replied with some stumbling as he felt suddenly nervous standing in front of the class. – “O, speak again, bright angel! for thou art” – you exaggerated as Peter chuckled soft. Hearing him laugh made you giggle loud as you placed the script against your mouth to cover up your laughing. – “Please continue…” – the teacher called out as you removed the script from against you and started to read a few lines in your mind.

You were about to open your mouth to say something stupid again as Peter suddenly pulled your script a bit down with his finger, catching your attention. – “I’ll start again…” – he said as you blinked a few times and let him continue. Peter cleared his throat as he pretended to search for the right line in the script as he suddenly started to speak. – “My heart beats for you and only you as you are the fairest lady I have ever laid my eyes on…” – You gasped quietly as Peter’s words sounded so sincere. Peter continued as you felt yourself get lost in his eyes. It was as Peter was everything you ever wanted as he made your heart skip beats. – “From the moment I first saw you I knew my heart belonged to you…” – You looked quickly down, flipping through the pages as you couldn’t find anything from what Peter was saying.

Peter than in an act of bravery took your hand and pulled you closer to him, making you take a few steps forward. He didn’t let go of your hand as you could feel his thumb stroke your hand gently. – “We might have different eyes, but I know we both see fine…” – all the students and the teacher were looking confused at each other as none of those line’s were from the script. You swallowed soft as you felt your whole-body tingle. Peter’s words sounded like a poem straight from his heart as you squeezed his hand soft back. Peter than suddenly took another step closer to you as he dropped the script on the ground and moved his hand towards you. You gasped quietly again as he placed some hair of yours behind your ear, his touch made your cheeks burn up. He then softly let his hand slide down your cheek till your chin as something inside of you blindly pushed your head closer to him.

The teacher suddenly cleared her throat as you were leaning in for a kiss in front of class. Peter nervously smiled as he stopped talking, pulling his head back as he felt everyone stare at him. He briefly made eye contact with Ned who looked confused at him back. “That… that… was…” – the teacher started as she didn’t know what to say as nothing came from the original script. – “Beautiful…” – you finished as you kept gazing into Peter’s eyes. – “Thank you… Y/n…” – Peter stuttered nervous as he rubbed the back of his head with his hand. He noticed he was still holding your hand, so he quickly pulled his away and took a step back.

“Thank you, Peter and Y/n…” – the teacher said when Peter walked back to his desk as you followed his movements with love in your eyes. You seated yourself down seconds later as for the resting time of class you hide your blushing face away. When the bell finally rang you collected your supplies and rushed out of the classroom. Ned had been nudging Peter the whole time for more information about what happened. Peter ignored his chatting as he jumped up and followed you through the crowd. He followed you towards your locker as you were emptying your backpack. – “Hey there Juliet!” – Peter called out as he closed your locker door in front of you, making you turn your attention to him.

You quickly opened your locker door again to hide your blushing face as you felt nervous around him. Peter walked around you as he came standing on the other side of you. – “Pretty crazy huh…” – he started to say shy as you agreed with him. – “Did you mean it…” – Peter looked with shock at you as he didn’t expect the question. – “I mean… it seemed to come from your heart and I … I must say it did something to me…” – You said soft, trying not to sound like fool. Peter laughed shy as he looked brief at the ground. – “I’ll tell you the truth over diner, how does that sound Juliet?” – A smile appeared on your face as you were eager to spend more time with him. You could feel yourself explode with love for him as you accepted his offer. – “I would love to my Romeo…”

Peter went over the details with you as he then said goodbye to you. You waved him shy goodbye as you closed your locker door and let yourself lovingly slide down to the ground as you couldn’t wait to go on a date with him.

Check out my Masterlist for more Marvel imagine’s

You sighed loud as you opened the script and read the gibberish words. – “Anytime now Y/n” – the teacher called out as some students laughed soft, you looked brief over your shoulder as you gave her a death stare. With a sigh you started to read out the gibberish talk. – “Oh Romeo, Romeo! Wherefore art thou Romeo? Deny thy father and thy name…” – you said on a slow and annoyed tone as you rather not engaged in this stupid act. – “Try to put more emotion into it, Y/n!” – the teacher called out as you sighed even louder and slapped your hand against the script. – “Those lines are ridiculous! I mean who even speaks like that!”

“People in that time area did, Y/n now continue please!” – The teacher replied as she pointed at Peter to take the next few lines. – “By a name, I know not how to tell thee who I am” – Peter replied with some stumbling as he felt suddenly nervous standing in front of the class. – “O, speak again, bright angel! for thou art” – you exaggerated as Peter chuckled soft. Hearing him laugh made you giggle loud as you placed the script against your mouth to cover up your laughing. – “Please continue…” – the teacher called out as you removed the script from against you and started to read a few lines in your mind.

You were about to open your mouth to say something stupid again as Peter suddenly pulled your script a bit down with his finger, catching your attention. – “I’ll start again…” – he said as you blinked a few times and let him continue. Peter cleared his throat as he pretended to search for the right line in the script as he suddenly started to speak. – “My heart beats for you and only you as you are the fairest lady I have ever laid my eyes on…” – You gasped quietly as Peter’s words sounded so sincere. Peter continued as you felt yourself get lost in his eyes. It was as Peter was everything you ever wanted as he made your heart skip beats. – “From the moment I first saw you I knew my heart belonged to you…” – You looked quickly down, flipping through the pages as you couldn’t find anything from what Peter was saying.

Peter than in an act of bravery took your hand and pulled you closer to him, making you take a few steps forward. He didn’t let go of your hand as you could feel his thumb stroke your hand gently. – “We might have different eyes, but I know we both see fine…” – all the students and the teacher were looking confused at each other as none of those line’s were from the script. You swallowed soft as you felt your whole-body tingle. Peter’s words sounded like a poem straight from his heart as you squeezed his hand soft back. Peter than suddenly took another step closer to you as he dropped the script on the ground and moved his hand towards you. You gasped quietly again as he placed some hair of yours behind your ear, his touch made your cheeks burn up. He then softly let his hand slide down your cheek till your chin as something inside of you blindly pushed your head closer to him.

The teacher suddenly cleared her throat as you were leaning in for a kiss in front of class. Peter nervously smiled as he stopped talking, pulling his head back as he felt everyone stare at him. He briefly made eye contact with Ned who looked confused at him back. “That… that… was…” – the teacher started as she didn’t know what to say as nothing came from the original script. – “Beautiful…” – you finished as you kept gazing into Peter’s eyes. – “Thank you… Y/n…” – Peter stuttered nervous as he rubbed the back of his head with his hand. He noticed he was still holding your hand, so he quickly pulled his away and took a step back.

“Thank you, Peter and Y/n…” – the teacher said when Peter walked back to his desk as you followed his movements with love in your eyes. You seated yourself down seconds later as for the resting time of class you hide your blushing face away. When the bell finally rang you collected your supplies and rushed out of the classroom. Ned had been nudging Peter the whole time for more information about what happened. Peter ignored his chatting as he jumped up and followed you through the crowd. He followed you towards your locker as you were emptying your backpack. – “Hey there Juliet!” – Peter called out as he closed your locker door in front of you, making you turn your attention to him.

You quickly opened your locker door again to hide your blushing face as you felt nervous around him. Peter walked around you as he came standing on the other side of you. – “Pretty crazy huh…” – he started to say shy as you agreed with him. – “Did you mean it…” – Peter looked with shock at you as he didn’t expect the question. – “I mean… it seemed to come from your heart and I … I must say it did something to me…” – You said soft, trying not to sound like fool. Peter laughed shy as he looked brief at the ground. – “I’ll tell you the truth over diner, how does that sound Juliet?” – A smile appeared on your face as you were eager to spend more time with him. You could feel yourself explode with love for him as you accepted his offer. – “I would love to my Romeo…”

Peter went over the details with you as he then said goodbye to you. You waved him shy goodbye as you closed your locker door and let yourself lovingly slide down to the ground as you couldn’t wait to go on a date with him.

Requested by: Anon, Forever tag: @httpschanwoo, @spxce-frxckles, @miss-fangirl72, @alex–awesome–22, @fandomnerdsarecool, @slybitter11, @thedeadlymaria

You were just done with a class as you were walking over to the cafeteria with your backpack dragging over the floor. You were still exhausted from gym class as you had to run around the football field. You could care less how people stared at you for dragging your backpack over the floor, but you were to exhausted to lift it up. The cafeteria was crowed as you let your eyes go over every table. You were sighing deep as you didn’t want to sit with strangers or alone at some distant area as suddenly you saw a familiar person lift it’s head up from the crowd.

You frowned slightly when Peter Parker was holding his hand in the air to get your attention. Ned who sat next to Peter kept nudging him to pull his arm down as Peter seemed to be arguing with him while keeping his hand up. Seeing no other free table, you picked up your backpack and placed it over your shoulder on your way to Peter’s table. When you were near him he quickly pulled his tray closer to him and moved Ned’s backpack aside that laid on the table. You seated yourself in front of Peter as Ned looked terrified at him. When you weren’t looking was Peter kicking Ned subtly to not look so scared like that.

The boys weren’t used to have girls around them. Most of the time they spent together talking about science and build Lego structures. – “So… Y/n…” – Peter started but swallowed deep as you were looking at him. You slightly raised your eyebrow, waiting for something more of a possible question as Peter chuckled nervously, while tugging at his sleeve. – “Well I’m going to get something to eat while you might find your voice back?” – You got up as Peter stuttered a bit and nodded quickly. As soon as you left slapped Ned hard against Peter’s arm. – “Au! What was that for?” – Peter whined as he rubbed the pain area.

“Perhaps for asking a girl over to our table! I don’t know how to act around girls?” – Ned called out to Peter, trying not to raise his voice as Peter sighed deep, moving his head towards Ned. – “Just be yourself!” – Ned gave Peter a questionable look. – “Peter, no girl wants to know the real us!” – Peter wanted to explain to Ned that some girls would appreciate it as he noticed you arriving again. – “So, did you find your voice back?” – You joked as you seated yourself down and grabbed your fork with some food on it. – “Of course, Y/n!” – Peter replied in a steadier tone than before as you paused your fork for a moment as Peter thought you were going to joke at him as you just smiled at him. When he exhaled subtle, Peter felt more at ease around you as you were enjoying your lunch.

When it was time to head to class you said goodbye to them as you rushed away. Peter and Ned followed you to class on a slower pace as they were talking exuberant about science since they were too scared to talk about in front of you. They arrived in class a few moments before you as they seated themselves somewhere behind you. You were sitting on the second row, with the blackboard as front view as you were unpacking your backpack. Peter and Ned were whispering a bit as Peter pulled out his laptop from his backpack. The teacher entered moments later as you couldn’t wait what kind of book you would need to read this time. You really adored English as it widened your vision on books, you learned a lot of new books that you never knew you would love.

“Good afternoon class!” – the teacher spoke as she placed her briefcase on her desk. Everyone stopped talking as they watched the teacher pull out several things out of her briefcase. She was trying to hide her wide smile as she pulled out a small book and placed it behind her back. – “Class, I have brought you a classic that I believe everyone will adore!” – She said as she stood in the centre in front of the blackboard. Slowly revealing the book from behind her she could see all off the students leaning forward. – “Romeo and Juliet!” – she called out, trying to hide a squeal as some students loved the idea.

“No!” – you called out frustrated as you groaned annoyed with your elbows resting on your desk as you let your head fall on the desk together with your arms. Some students started laugh soft at your behaviour as the teacher looked at you with big confused eyes. – “I’d thought you’d like that, Y/n?” – she asked you as you banged your head softly against your desk. More students started to laugh as they loved your little act of drama. – “It’s not that bad…” – the teacher said to ease your thoughts as you lifted your head. – “It’s boring!” – you whined out as the teacher gave you a questioning look. – “Romeo and Juliet are the most popular story about love, tragedy and longing for someone that you would risk anything…”

You rolled with your eyes as you crossed your arms and leaned back in your chair. – “It’s a story about two fools where one fool fakes her death because her family doesn’t want her to be with him!” – you replied as you had no interest into reading that boring story. – “and I don’t blame her as she was only 14 years old and clearly drunk on love that she didn’t understand!” – The teacher crossed her arms slowly as she looked with a stern eye at you. – “Y/n, there is nothing wrong with having an opinion, but can you please stay respectful!” – You nodded soft with a sigh as the teacher was pleased with it for a moment.

The teacher than continued to explain to everyone why Romeo and Juliette were so important to read. – “William Shakespeare was the greatest writer from that time as he gave theatre a whole new meaning.” – You rolled with your eyes as you disagreed with her. – “Shakespeare was a drama queen!” – you joked as Peter snorted loud from your comment, other students laughed loud as they were out of control. – “Alright calm down!” – the teacher called out as she tried to calm down the laughing students. – “If you are such a hater against his work Y/n, you don’t mind if I use you for a little reading?” – You sighed loud as the teacher signalled for you to get up from your chair.

You got up and made your way over to the front as the teacher handed you a copy of the script. You took it with a fake smile as she smiled full of mischief back at you. – “Y/n you will play the role of Juliet!” – the teacher called out as you looked with a disgusted look at the funny lines in the script. – “Now I just need a Romeo…” – she said as she started to tap her finger against her chin, letting her eyes go over the boys in class. Peter was grinning at the teacher as a smirk curled up with her. – “Peter! You will be playing Romeo!” – She pointed at Peter as he lowered the screen of his laptop. – “Yeah -yeah- sure…” – he stuttered as he jumped up and walked over to the front.

summary:
Yandere Peter Parker Stalking You
Headcanon #1
Imagine: Peter Parker stalking you.
-How could this ever happen?
-Peter and you...
body:
Yandere Peter Parker Stalking You

Headcanon #1
Imagine: Peter Parker stalking you.

-How could this ever happen?

-Peter and you are actually friends.

-He began to develope and obsessive and unhealthy crush on you, he calls it love.

-He walks you home and make sure you make it home safely.

-As Spider-Man he will patrol your area more than three times, he even watches you from your window.

-If you were on the street and anyone harasses you then he will make sure they never see daylight again.

-If you are being bullied by anyone he will make sure that they won’t get home unharmed.

-He secretly takes pictures of you, admiring your beauty and how wondering how the world ever deserved an angel like you.

-He prints out all the pictures of you and tapes it in his closet wall where Aunt May won’t look.

-He has tons of pictures of you doing many things: homework, eating lunch, reading, even sleeping, all unsuspecting that Peter is photographing you.

-Once you left your jacket at his apartment during a project and he still has it, never returned it to you, and hugs it while he sleeps to remind himself of you.

-He texts you every day, asking how you’ve been and what’s on your mind, you love how caring Peter is.

-He get jealous when you hang you with other people and you show your sweet smile, he knows they’re just your friends but there’s just this ache in his heart when he sees you with someone else. However, that is to be elaborated on some other time.

-When he went to your house for a project or for homework, he may or may not have taken one of your shirts or undergarments.

-He knows your entire class schedule and your routines if you have them.

-He knows everything about you.

-And I mean everything.

-He loves you very very very much.

title: Yet Another Field Trip Fanfic
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2uyGQXW

by PrincessRobocop

Peter Parker has been living in Stark tower with all the other Avengers for a while now, and he loves it there. Then one day at school he receives a permission slip for a field trip to his own home!

summary: Can I request a headcanon on how Peter would react to (female) reader proposing to him?
question: Can I request a headcanon on how Peter would react to (female) reader proposing to him?
answer:
Absolutely dear!

Requests: open

Reader: Female

–

• You two were simply chilling and watching a ridiculously cheesy movie (which you guys took joy in by criticism and making jokes)

• You had the ring for a while but never fully understood how you were going to pop the question

• Of course there was the traditional wait until the guy proposes bit

• But that wasn’t going to cut it for you

• There was plenty of time to wait

• The right time to ask felt like it was creeping up on you

• Besides, you wanted to see the look on Peter’s face when you asked him

• Speaking of which, Peter didn’t really know you were deep in thought when he joked with you about a cliche scene

• “Wow, he really just asked her that in the most dorkiest way possible.”

• “Marry me.”

• He kind of froze and looked at you

• He realized you were serious and it made him flush deeply

• “W-Wha-”

• “Marry me?”

• The ring was pulled swiftly out of your pocket and held up in front of his face

• He shot up and ran to a nearby drawer, digging around until he found the velvet box he hid away for months

• “I was gonna-”

• “Beat ya’ to it, Spidey.”

• Now with fingers both decorated in rings, you continued to joke about Peter’s red face and how he probably was going to propose in the dorkiest way possible

• You definitely don’t bring up you beat him to proposing later on (spoilers: you do)

–
